General.Name: Xinjiang Joinworld Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Joinworld Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aluminum products in China and internationally. It also provides aluminum, electronic aluminum foil, electrode foil, corrosion foil, formed foil, and other electronic components, as well as aluminum alloys. The company's aluminum products are used in electronic aluminum foil, electronic guide wire, alumina powder, aviation aluminum alloy, and target materials, as well as electronics, aerospace, integrated circuits, and other fields; electronic aluminum foils are used for the production of electrode foil; electrode foils are used for the production of aluminum electrolytic capacitors; and aluminum alloys are used in electronic consumer goods, energy-saving wires, automobile engines, automobile decoration, and architectural decoration fields, as well as other fields of electronics, electricity, transportation, and construction. In addition, the company manufactures and sells electronic materials. Further, it provides logistics trade and metallurgical technology services, as well as development of mineral resources. Xinjiang Joinworld Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Urumqi, China.
General.Address: No.18, Kashi East Road, Urumqi, China, 830013
